title: How to auto-switch the an app's chat notifications from Silent on weekdays to Default on weekends
content:
Usually on the weekdays, I have the MS Teams app's Chat notifications on Silent. I want this to switch automatically to Default on the weekends.

I didnt want to use DND because I still want to hear my phone ringing. I only wanted to silence the chat notifications while I'm on Teams on my computer. The app notifies me on both desktop and mobile which is annoying but I really need to get the notifications on the weekend as I need to monitor the chat.
